statements: SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status='pending';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, approval_date FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_address, applicant_phone_number FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status='approved';
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT application_id, applicant_address, applicant_phone_number FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount >= 10000
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age > 30;
SELECT avg(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT * FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approved_amount > 5000 ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age > 30 ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount >= 50000 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT applicant_name FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_age < 25;
SELECT application_id, approval_date, approved_amount, interest_rate FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approved_amount <= 100000 ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM loan_applicants;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, loan_purpose, loan_status FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM loan_applicants ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM loan_applicants WHERE applicant_age > 30;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applicants JOIN loan_approvals ON loan_applicants.applicant_id = loan_approvals.applicant_id WHERE approved_amount > 5000;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_status FROM loan_applicants JOIN loan_applications ON loan_applicants.applicant_id = loan_applications.applicant_id WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_applicants, AVG(applicant_age) AS avg_age FROM loan_applicants;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_email FROM applicant_details ORDER BY applicant_email ASC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_department FROM loan_officers WHERE officer_department = 'Loan Processing';
SELECT application_id, approval_date, approval_decision FROM approval_history ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status='approved';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_age FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM approval_history ORDER BY approval_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT la.applicant_name, ad.applicant_email, lo.officer_name FROM loan_applications la JOIN applicant_details ad ON la.application_id = ad.applicant_id JOIN loan_officers lo ON la.application_id = lo.officer_id;
SELECT la.applicant_name, lh.approval_decision FROM loan_applications la JOIN approval_history lh ON la.application_id = lh.application_id WHERE lh.approval_decision='rejected';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_address FROM applicant_details ORDER BY applicant_name;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT approval_id, application_id, approval_status FROM loan_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name, applicant_address FROM applicant_details WHERE LENGTH(applicant_address) > 20;
SELECT applicant_name, employer_name, employment_start_date, employment_end_date FROM applicant_details JOIN employment_history ON applicant_details.applicant_id = employment_history.applicant_id;
SELECT applicant_name, score, last_updated FROM applicant_details JOIN credit_score ON applicant_details.applicant_id = credit_score.applicant_id WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
